case_vignette: In your outpatient clinic you are seeing a 22-year-old female for her annual check-up. She has a past medical history significant for sexual abuse in her teens. Currently she has no complaints. She reports that her last menstrual period was 1 week ago. Her temperature is 98.5 deg F (36.9 deg C), pulse is 65/min, blood pressure is 110/75 mmHg, respirations are 11/min. Physical exam is notable only for dry mucous membranes with multiple dental carries and calluses on the dorsum of her right hand. Her BMI is 17.
question: What is the most likely diagnosis?
